synopsis: In this engaging episode of Pineapple Blunt Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir, along with their guest Gara, dive deep into the complexities of breakups and personal growth. They share their unique experiences, insights on healing, and the importance of self-discovery, all while maintaining a lighthearted and relatable tone.
quotes: You have to realize that your brain is a machine; it's complicated, but it serves a purpose.
Just because something isn't perfect doesn't mean it doesn't have value.
I had to ask myself, do you like yourself? Do you like the life that you're living?
It's okay that the pizza is lukewarm and floppy; it still satisfies my hunger.
Sometimes you have to let go of the feeling that something was just so special; it doesn't mean it wasn't real.
You can be in a storm, but you are not the storm.
Every day is a choice; choose to engage with your life.
You don't have to be miserable; everything is fine the way it is.
Your body remembers what you've been through, even when your mind tries to forget.
Life is cyclical; you have to keep asking the question to find your way.
